description: This recipe is by Betty Fussell and takes 1 hour 15 minutes, plus 1 hour's sitting and overnight soaking. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Grilled Chicken Breast With Black Beans And Goat Cheese Sauce
title_page: Grilled Chicken Breast With Black Beans And Goat Cheese Sauce Recipe - NYT Cooking
